TEXT_INSTRUCT:
INSTRUCTIONS: You will have to type the sequences that will be shown. Do it as fast as you can without making any errors. You need to do the movement faster than {} seconds. After each sequence you will get feedback about your performance. The BLUE bar represents your last score, the GREEN bar is your best score for that particular sequence, and the YELLOW bar is the best scores for all participants. The faster you do it the larger the bar will be. You will practice different sequences during the session.
Press a key when ready.
